amendment.description: Amendment allows veterans centers to receive grants to develop specialized programs to assist unemployed veterans in becoming entrepreneurs and adds training for veterans centers to improve outreach to veterans in areas of high unemployment at the Veterans Development Summit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-121 to allow veterans centers to receive grants to develop specialized programs to assist unemployed veterans in becoming entrepreneurs and adds training for veterans centers to improve outreach to veterans in areas of high unemployment at the Veterans Development Summit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boccieri amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
